blackrock-tableau-dashboard.title: BlackRock Tableau Dashboard
blackrock-tableau-dashboard.desc: In the summer of 2020, I interned with BlackRock where I got to process portfolio model data and display it visually within an interactive Tableau dashboard.

workout-application.title: Workout Application
workout-application.desc: In my last year of university, I was a part of a team of 5 students to design and create a workout tracker app written in React Native.

ti-tiva-launchpad-games.title: TI Tiva Launchpad Games
ti-tiva-launchpad-games.desc: Throughout my college career, I created 2 games written in C that ran on a Tiva Launchpad. This involved understanding low-level software and hardware communication interfaces such as UART, SPI, I2C, CAN, and more.

mips-16-bit-5-stage-pipelined-microproce.title: MIPS 16-bit 5-stage Pipelined Microprocessor
mips-16-bit-5-stage-pipelined-microproce.desc: During my third year of university, I and my partner in ECE 552: Intro to Computer Architecture, designed our very own MIPS 16-bit 5-stage pipelined microprocessor with forwarding enabled and cache in System Verilog.
